Question: Millennium Printing(Shenzhen)Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Millennium Printing(Shenzhen)Co.,Ltd

CES 2024

- Specializes in high-quality paper packaging products
- Offers packaging solutions including project development, design, testing, printing color management, automatic production, and logistics distribution
- Product range includes packaging boxes, gift boxes, displays, hangtags, corrugated cartons, honeycomb cushioning materials, FSC certified packaging, UV printing packaging, and other special paper products
- Multiple production bases in Guangdong
- Committed to customer service and over 50 years of successful experience
- Adheres to core values of Customers First, People-oriented, Excellence, and Innovation
- Mission is to create value for customers, brighten the future for the company, and pursue happiness for employees
- Vision is to strive for excellence and build a global leading packaging technology company
Summary_cn:
千禧印刷（深圳）有限公司

CES 2024

- 专业生产高质量的纸质包装品
- 提供包装方案，包括项目开发、设计、测试、印刷色彩管理、自动生产和物流分销
- 产品范围包括包装盒子、礼品盒子、展示器、吊牌、瓦楞纸箱、蜂窝缓冲材料、FSC认证包装、UV印刷包装和其他特殊纸品
- 在广东设有多个生产基地
- 致力于客户服务，并拥有超过50年的成功经验
- 坚持“客户至上，以人为本，追求卓越，创新”的核心价值观
- 使命是为客户创造价值，为公司开辟未来，追求员工幸福
- 愿景是追求卓越，建立全球领先的包装技术公司
